lenders.occupational_info:
http://www.kingsoncrusher.com
Kingson Crusher is a high-technology professional enterprise of India and manufacturer of stone crusher and mining crusher. Kingson is one of the biggest manufacturer in crushing and grinding industry in the worls. Main products include Crusher, Jaw Crusher, Mobile Crusher, Impact Crusher, Cone Crusher, Vertical Shaft Impact Crusher, Horizontal Shaft Impact Crusher, Sand making machine, Ball Mill and other pertinent machines and equipments such as Vibrating Feeder, Grizzly Feeder, Vibrating Screen and Belt Crusher.
Being a leading global manufacturer of crushing and construction equipment, we offer advanced, rational solutions for any size-reduction requirements, including quarry, aggregate, material handling production and complete plant plan. We also supply individual crushers and equippments as well as Crusher spare parts.

Crusher Products: Crusher, Crushers, Crusher India, Crushers India, Crusher manufacturer, Crusher manufacturer India, Crusher manufacturers India, Crushing, Crushing plants, Jaw Crusher, Jaw Crushers, Jaw Crusher India, Jaw Crusher manufacturer India, Impact Crusher, Impact Crushers, Impactor Crusher, Impactor Crushers, Impact Crusher India, Impact Crusher manufacturer India, Vertical Shaft Impact Crusher, Vertical Shaft Impactor Crusher, Horizontal Shaft Impactor Crusher, Horizontal Shaft Impactor Crusher, Cone Crusher, Cone Crusher India, Cone Crusher manufacturer India, Cone Crushers, Mobile Crusher, Mobile Crusher India, Mobile Crushers, Mobile Crushing Plant, Mobile Crushing Plants, Vibrating Screen, Vibrating Screen, Sand Making Machine, Sand Making Machines, Complete Crushing Plant, Complete Crusher Plant, Aggregate Plant, Aggregate Crusher Plant, Vibrating Feeder, Vibrating Feeders, Grizzly Feeder, Grizzly Feeder, Belt Conveyor, Belt Conveyors.

lenders.occupational_info:
I prepare reviews of financial statements, which are engagements wherein my company provides moderate assurance that the client's stated results do not contain material misstatements. Usually, in the U.S., if a company has less than $10 million in debt, then the bank who owns that debt will only require a review, which is far less detailed than an audit. 

Additionally, I prepare tax returns, which are documents that inform state and federal governments of how the taxpayer calculated the tax he/she owes the government(s).

lenders.loan_because: Lending a hand rather than giving a handout will make the world a better place for you and for me.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I've got a bit to spare, just like you.

lenders.name: Martien
lenders.loan_because: This is the best and most direct way to help others on a personal basis so that dreams can come true!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to make contact with the child within so that childhood hurts can be healed.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to support entrepreneurship and economic growth in developing countries.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance and I hope to bring a smile to as many faces as possible.

lenders.name: Alanna
lenders.loan_because: it is good to know that i can wake up every day, and know that i have not frogoten people that need my help.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I believe charity and aid-based structures of development are antiquated, psyched to engage in such an innovative approach as microenterprise/finance
lenders.occupational_info: Analyzing ways to fix tomorrow, today

lenders.name: Caseyann
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a Graduate student working on a PhD in Psychology.  It's pretty intense, but I've always loved school and the field I've chosen keeps my attention and keeps me on my toes.  To pay my bills (which become more substantial every month), I bartend and waitress part-time at a great traditional Mexican restaurant.

lenders.name: Shawn and Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I think most people need a hand up, not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with mental illnesses get a job.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I can. Others have a real need and I'm fortunate enough to be able to make a difference. I'm tired of being surrounded by money at work when I know there are millions who go without the basics of life.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I don't make very much money but if I make a little extra,  KIVA is one of the places to which I contribute my hard earned wages.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: After 15+ trips to Peru I have an affinity for the people. I have been welcomed each time and on my 3rd trip to the Sacred Valley I had a very eye opening and heart changing day.
lenders.occupational_info: I design for products and services and love to travel. I volunteer with VIDA - an organization that brings much needed medical relief to 13 countries Latin America.

lenders.name: Anton
lenders.loan_because:
I think that the best way to lift a nation out of poverty is by helping individuals engage in commerce.

In related news, what use is wealth if you cannot share it?

lenders.loan_because: I want to make an impact.

lenders.name: Menka
lenders.loan_because: I want to donate in my father's memory. May his hardwork and positive attitude inspire others to forge ahead and make their dreams a reality.

lenders.name: Lorena
lenders.loan_because: Estoy apoyando la creación de nuevas empresas a emprendedores de mi comunidad, busco con esto generar en ellos mejoramiento en su calidad de vida y la de quienes los rodean
lenders.occupational_info: A través de asesoría capacitación y apoyo económico se evalúan, impulsan y ponen a punto los proyectos que resulten favorecidos por su viabilidad, proyección y creación de nuevas fuentes de trabajo. Me encargo de apoyar a los emprendedores en sus nuevos negocios para que logren sacarlos adelante y mejoren su calidad de vida
